alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 9:33AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Webb County through 1015 AM CDT... At 933 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbia Bridge, or 24 miles northwest of Laredo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Texas A&M, Las Tiendas, Laredo International Airport, Botines, Unitec Industrial Park, Ranchos Penitas West, Columbia Bridge, St Augustine High School South Laredo, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Laredo Country Club, Laredo Community College and Orvil. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 21. US Highway 83 between mile markers 696 and 718. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
